abstract: The CIT Group on Friday said it has settled its dispute with the financier Carl C. Icahn, who will provide a $1 billion loan from his Icahn Capital.
snippet: The CIT Group on Friday said it has settled its dispute with the financier Carl C. Icahn, who will provide a $1 billion loan from his Icahn Capital.
lead_paragraph: The CIT Group on Friday said it had settled its dispute with the financier Carl C. Icahn, who will provide a $1 billion loan from his Icahn Capital.

headline.main: CIT Accepts $1 Billion Loan From Icahn

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
